data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Plyomydas Wilcox & Papavero, 1971 with the description of two new species and its transfer to Mydinae (Insecta: Diptera: Mydidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castillo, Stephanie, Dikow, Torsten (2017): Taxonomic revision of Plyomydas Wilcox & Papavero, 1971 with the description of two new species and its transfer to Mydinae (Insecta: Diptera: Mydidae). Revista Brasileira de Entomologia 61: 192-202, DOI: 10.1016/j.rbe.2017.03.002
